short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Side panel that allows you to manage your bookmarks using Linkstache.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The companion to the Linkstache mobile & desktop applications that allows you to access and manage your Linkstache bookmarks within a persistent side panel in your browser.

Use Linkstache to easily save, organize, search and retrieve all your favorite websites, articles, videos, social media posts and more in one convenient place.

When you save a link to Linkstache it's instantly available on all your devices!

Features:
★ Simple, intuitive Link organizer
★ Unlimited Staches (folders), Sub-Staches & Links
★ Secure daily backups in the cloud
★ Secure access from all your devices
★ Import & export
★ Search Staches & Links, by title, description & custom tags
★ Private Staches & Links
★ Share Links easily with others
★ Mark Staches & Links as favorites
★ Mark Links as safe to view
★ Sort Staches & Links
★ Light & dark modes
★ Custom icons & colors
★ Multiple users for one account (Pro users only)

3 levels of access:
- Core
	- FREE!
	- Contains ads
	- Single user access only
	- Limited icon pack
- Premium
	- Subscription
	- Ad free
	- Single user access only
	- Extended icon pack
- Pro
	- 3 subscription levels
	- Ad free
	- Multiple users for one account

If you would like to learn more, visit us at https://linkstache.com
